Preterit.text: hat ʕal d-aṯət w-mxabállux-li w-lə=tlelux meni, qum izúx mobel-e l-ruḥux, w-məṯnáḥ m-u=taʕb-ano ʻSince you have come, have reported [this] to me and have not hidden yourself from me, go and take [the treasure] and rest from this troubleʼ; 244; 47/14;

Imperativ.text: izolux mxabár ḥoli, amár k-aṯi Naro! ʻgeh und benachrichtige meinen Onkel, sage: Naro ist gekommenʼ; 248; 69/569;
